phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Asta mustered up everything he had and used it on this blow to Vetto.
How do you like that, you bastard?!
But the battle was not over yet!
I am taking you all down with me...
I will blow this whole temple to smithereens!
Accepting all the feelings of Asta and the other members,
It does not matter how strong your magic is!
Dark Magic: Dark Cloaked Dimension Slash!
Consider that my thanks for looking after my squad.
Stay there and watch for a while.
You are going to be my main dish...
After I season you with despair, as you watch all of your friends die!
I dealt with you in the end.
Hopefully, you can pass on now.
Sorry, but I did not despair at all, either.
We are being led far away
Until we shatter the road between light and darkness
End of the Battle, End of Despair
I am falling down because of a twist of fate
The harmony we had is in the past
The scent of you is stuck in my head
Waiting just is not enough anymore, Yai yah!
Until we seize the hope in front of us
We are going to take you right to the hospital!
I-I did not ask for your help.
But I guess you saved us.
You should have shown up sooner.
Who do you think you are talking to?
I have fallen for you all over again!
I thought I was going to die...
I saw my life flash before my eyes...
You were surprisingly useful for once.
Well, are not you guys fluffy?
We are done here, so can I go see Marie now?
You are supposed to praise me right now.
You are so awesome, Captain Yami!
And members of the Black Bulls.
Congratulations on defeating the Eye of the Midnight Sun team
Thank you from the bottom of my heart for saving our Underwater Temple!
Please allow me, as the high priest, to grant your wish!
we will be taking the magic stone that you have here at the Underwater Temple.
Hey, Gramps, I thought you knew about the magic stone.
You guys are after the magic stone, are not you?
If you want it, why do not we play a little game?
That is what you said, remember?
I just heard you guys talking about how you were looking
for something called a magic stone.
It is a magic stone, so I assume it is a stone...
What kind of stone is it?
Ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow, ow!
I have not felt this pain since Saussy Village!
I wondered where you would gone off to.
I guess you were looking for the magic stone for us!
Ah, so that is the magic stone...
If that is all you want, sure, go ahead and take it.
All right, we will be taking it.
The moment I relaxed, all my strength just...
I am all out of magic, too.
Let us tend to your wounds and help you recover your magic and stamina.
To think that Vetto was actually defeated.
I will never forgive those who make Licht sad.
We must take back the magic stone...
so that we can fulfill our dream as the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
I cannot believe we have to wait for Finral's magic to recover
before we can go back to the surface.
It turns out you are a super cute girl.
Please do not look at me!
If your eyes get any pervier, I am going to sew them shut, Pervy Finral.
And Grey, if you are that embarrassed, you are never going to make it in the world.
And you should be a little more humble, you witch floozy!
I cannot wait to fight again.
I am so hungry, I cannot even move.
Why the hell is it that you are just hungry?!
I wonder if that is yummy...
is that we got our asses kicked, so I did not get to look cool at all, damn it!
Nothing we can do about that.
This was the full extent of our abilities.
You are the saviors of the Underwater Temple!
We, the absolute worst Magic Knights squad in history,
I want to get even stronger!
Then I will get even stronger than you!
I want to see Marie more.
I wish I was not so easily embarrassed.
Sounds like you are all better.
Being thanked by others is pretty nice.
You are my friend, but I could not protect your voice.
What are you talking about, Noelle?
Thank you for protecting my home.
It is because you helped me with my training.
I have not given up on my dream.
So that I can go sing up on the surface again...
I will make sure this heals.
So when I am an idol someday, you would better come and hear me sing,
I will definitely go, so you would better save me the best seat in the house!
Oh, you should probably get some rest.
Thanks for coming to see us.
That must be the sea goddess everyone was talking about.
I am going to get my leg healed up fast!
I have to dance the courtship dance for her!
You have to introduce me to her later!
Help me win her over, will ya?
I am starting to feel better!
I am pretty sure Noelle's unavailable, though.
We ended up getting the magic stone, but so much happened that we did not expect.
Do not blame me if you get lost.
Wow, you are amazing, Captain Yami!
You must have sensed my ki.
I asked you what is up, did not I?
Answer my question or I will send you flying.
Since we are leaving this place tomorrow, I wanted go exploring a bit.
So I was wandering here and there.
Just full of energy, are not you?
I found fossilized seashells, almost got swallowed by a giant sea anemone,
and got attacked by this insane swarm of wharf roaches!
I happened to find these pretty flowers.
I do not know what it is,
but these guys must have had something they cannot forgive, either.
Something that makes them hate humans so much.
People like you have no right to talk about such things!
Now you have done it, human!
Do not think that you have hope just because you have banded together, humans!
There is no way that I would lose... against you humans!
I thought that maybe he was feeling more despair than anyone else.
You are an idiot, are not you?
I asked if you were an idiot.
Answer the question or I will send you flying.
Idiots do not need to think so hard about stuff like that, you idiot.
You just need to keep chasing your dream.
And I cannot push it back up!
Both of my arms are broken!
For now, I just need to keep chasing my dream, huh?
My dream, no, our dream is...
It is insanely shabby, but I am going to take good care of it for the rest of my life!
I will repay you for this someday.
So you are going to become the Wizard King, too?
I thought you were just making fun of me.
I have no interest in being too friendly with my rival.
But you are the one who gave me hope.
Even if you are poor, an orphan...
We can become greater than anyone else in this world.
To make Sister and everyone else happy...
Let us see who can become the Wizard King!
I just need to chase my dream right now!
I am going to hurry up and get my arms all healed, get even stronger,
and I am definitely going to become the Wizard King!
How long are you guys going to thank us?!
They sure have a lot of energy.
And there are so many cute girls!
Eat as much as you would like!
I did not get to look cool at all...
Even though I am the strongest at the Underwater Temple...
Charmy, how are the Eye of the Midnight Sun guys you caught doing?
They will not be able to escape, so we should be fine.
Hey, is not that a ridiculously powerful binding spell?
Do not give up on your dreams!
I am sure there is magic that can heal your leg and throat!
I will do my best to fix both of my arms, too.
I will be dancing on this leg again in no time!
I will not give up, no matter what!
I can finally go see Marie.
On such a bad day, whispering Bye Bye Black Birds
Will not make my anxiety go away
I have been crying for hours Baby
All those letters that you gave to me
Every time I read them again, the pain's gone
We are not alone, because we are perfect as four
Even though we are far apart, we are connected, believing you
I always feel you next to me
closer to me and a clover for you
I wish you the best of luck
You know you are not alone, because we are perfect as four
Even though we are far apart, we are connected, you live in me
I will always be by your side
closer to me and a clover for you
I wish you the best of luck
So I worked really hard saving all the Magic Knights on Raquey Beach.
I even got a star from the Wizard King!
I just do not know what to do with myself.
I am not even that amazing.
This, of course, is also true
Captain Jack was moved to tears!
I think I may be a bit drunk...
You better not let your guard down just because one mission's over!
The next one's coming right up!
I have to stay behind at the base?!
Black Clover, Page 51: Proof of Rightness.
Staying behind with everything I have is my magic!
